titles.title: I bhuvipai paraloka vintaina janama prabhuyesu kristuvulo

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhulo mi prayasam vyardham kadu prabhu panilo Yerigi edugucunu sdhirulai asaktito sagudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nutana srstinasincu miru suddha pravartanan prabhu Drstiki agupadajagrattaga naduvuma{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristuprabhuni pratyaksamandu niraparadhuluga Nilabadunu miru santito nadupunantamuvaraku{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dosini nivu gata dusprakriyalato nirdoshiga Prabhusannidhi niluvabetta pranamicci samadhana parace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristesu bandapai kattabadiya suvarta satya niriksanalu Viduvaka visvasamuto niluvudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Satkaryamulannitanu saphalulagucu santosimpa Prabhusvaramulo tandrito naduvu taginatluga{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daivatma sutulu devuni varasulu niluva Sramalalo kristu varasulu mahimapondaga yesuto mahimalo{/lang-eng}
